ygData.subject: RE: Question
ygData.msgSnippet: I currently play a Druid and at level 24 with 124 base wisdom I have 648 mana points , not counting any mana adders. Not doubting you, just throwing this out
ygData.messageBody:
I currently play a Druid and at level 24 with 124 base wisdom I have 648
mana 'points', not counting any mana adders. Not doubting you, just throwing
this out in hopes someone can make a comparison. BTW, I came up with this
number based on several different mana calculators found out on the web,
hope that number is right.

-----Original Message-----
From: MICHAEL CALHOUN [mailto:ninxf@...]
Sent: Saturday, September 11, 1999 1:56 AM
To: EQ
Subject: [eq_wizards] Question


From: MICHAEL CALHOUN <ninxf@...>

Now please correct me if I am wrong. Why does a druid have the same
amount of mana as a wizard?
